transcript.title: NSW Premier Nathan Rees and NSW Deputy Premier Carmel Tebbutt
transcript.content:
I congratulate NSW Premier, Nathan Rees and NSW Deputy Premier, Carmel Tebbutt on their appointments today.

Nathan and Carmel are highly talented and hard working individuals.

This leadership team has what it takes to confront the challenges facing NSW and move the state forward.

I look forward to working closely with Nathan, Carmel and the NSW Government on our shared challenges in education, health, climate change and water.

These matters require strong leadership from all levels of government and I am confident that is what Nathan and Carmel will provide.
